text: (to ai hafasa va aayasha) agar tum donon (is harakat se) tauba karo to khair kyonki tum donon ke dil tedhe hain aur agar tum donon rasool kee mukhaalefat mein ek doosare kee ayaanat karatee rahogee to kuchh parava nahin (kyon ki) khuda aur jibareel aur tamaam eemaanadaaron mein nek shakhsh unake madadagaar hain aur unake alaava kul pharishte madadagaar hain
